author: Frances Martel, Frances Martel
title: State Media: Trump Flattery of China Shows U.S. Needs 'Urgent' Coronavirus Aid
description: China's government-run Global Times concluded on Friday that President Donald Trump's description of a conversation with Chinese dictator Xi Jinping as "very good" proved that the American healthcare system was in need of "urgent" Chinese aid.
content:
China’s government-run Global Times concluded on Friday that President Donald Trump’s description of a conversation with Chinese dictator Xi Jinping as “very good” proved that the American healthcare system needed “urgent” Chinese aid.
